sentence: He has endorsed a number of a candidates in GOP Senate primaries who make the party establishment uneasy former football star Herschel Walker in Georgia, TV personality Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania and author J.D.
author: Niall Stanage
title: The Memo: McCarthy furor underlines Trumps grip on GOP

sentence: But that could change next year with Trump-endorsed candidates such as Herschel Walker in Georgia running in the midterm elections this November.
author: Daniel Chaitin
title: 'Long arm of Donald Trump' encircles Mitch McConnell in Senate
